        void put(byte[] key,
       InputStream valueStream,
       long valueLen)
         throws IOException

        IOException

      • writeHash

        void writeHash(HashType hashType)
               throws IOException
        Create or rewrite the index, which is required for random lookups to be visible.
        Parameters:
        hashType - choice of hash type, can be 32 or 64 bits.
        Throws:
        IOException
